reviewText: They pick the right title for this a disater I really do not have anything more too say the title speak for itself.
alot of action and disasters it was great to see it all no flaws at all i was even surprised by some scences which i never exspected wow!!it was really great to see

The movies were alright especially that they where in the same case that can save room. Good action and drama,and A little romance in someparts you have two man made disasters and one by the earth it self in each case humans try to fix things.
I enjoyed all of these movies. For those people who like watching disaster movies this is a good choice sit back and enjoy.
I didn't expect much for this price.  I was surprised that the movies were of high quality.  Thank you for this offer.
These are perfect movies for a rainy Saturday and/or Sunday. The acting is, in some cases, marginal, but the movies are well filmed and the scripts aren't too bad. You won't be bored.
Good "B" rate films at a good price!

I got this movie the other day and I started to Weather Weather Was and it would no open. So I went to Miami Magma and that quit running about half way through. Scorcher is the only movie on this DVD that actually works. I I get another one how do I know that it is not bad also.
typical 'made for tv' style disaster movies, however my husband loves all disaster movies and since this was a gift for him, it fit the bill.
I RECEIVED THE DVD IN GREAT CONDITION AND IT PLAYS PERFECTLY.
It arrived in good condition, we really like the movies. thanks

If you like disaster movies, and I do, this will be one you can watch without trying to figure out the science of it.  Kinda lame but, still good entertainment.  I don't watch this kind of movie to learn anything, anyway.

Arrived on time and excellent condition. Have two of the  titles already but sometimes I want to watch all three together I know lazy but true. But it is a good set of picks to have so don't have to buy all three and can enjoy at your leisure. I would definitely recommend this set of movies.
